entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom Fonts Don't Show On A Real Device #19935
  • Stop silent iOS updates with hard minimum requirements on xcode #19934
  • CollectionView animations on insert on Android cause performance and rendering issues #19933
  • Hot Restart Bug On "Select a Team" Drop Down #19929
  • Labels get clipped #19928
  • CryptographicException with app crash when signing XML using System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #19927
  • Opacity bug on BoxView.Background #19926
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming unfriendly usage of implicit operators through reflection #19922
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Issue with Clipping in CustomControl within SwipeView RightItems in CollectionView on Android #19920
  • App requesting NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription #19918

Closed

  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true does not toggle the first time on Android #8226
    .NET 8 SR2
  • PanUpdatedEventArgs should provide you with some way of get the current window-relative position of the pan gesture #19914
  • Add IsVisible Property to ToolbarItem #3701
    Backlog
  • Network connection gets terminated on iOS when the app goes background #19913
  • [iOS] Images from paths refuse to load in UI #19833
  • [iOS] Cannot create archive since it fails to unzip because it includes the link to local drive for some reason #19916
  • MAUI iOS - None of the input catalogs contained a matching stickers icon set or app icon set named "appicon" #14721
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr1' into main #19936
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
  • Split the InputTransparency tests #19925
  • [iOS][NativeAOT] Adding NativeAOT RunOniOS device test #19923
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃

Merged

  • [Android] FlyoutIsPresented property opens the Flyout #19807
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • Add basic docs for ScrollView implementations #19766
    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view. #19909
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures
  • [Hosting] Register ImageSource services as KeyedServices #19641
    area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Removes dead code from type conversion #19436
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
